Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 36th overall pick, by St. Louis (C) in 2020...
Injured on 5/24/2020 with a Broken Hip, out for full season...
Had first career hit on 8/15/2023, off Jason Billie (SF)...
Won World Series with St. Louis (C) in 2023...
Traded from St. Louis (C) to Philadelphia on 3/2/2025 (Going to STL: LF Abel Lopez. Going to PHI: CF Hector Huerta, LF Nathaniel Soliz, C Gregory Trejo)...
Injured on 6/12/2025 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Hit first career homerun on 4/16/2026, off Jorge Rubio (ATL)...
